meanings.definition: A type of respiratory protein found in certain marine invertebrates.
meanings.sent1: The hemerythrins in the sea creatures help them breathe underwater.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study hemerythrins to understand how marine animals survive in low-oxygen environments.
meanings.sent3: The hemerythrins at the underwater party were the life of the event, literally!
meanings.sent4: Like tiny oxygen superheroes, hemerythrins swoop in to save the day for marine creatures.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering hemerythrins glowed like precious jewels in the dark depths of the ocean.
